title: Land for rent
details: Boralesgamuwa- Facing Colombo- Horana Main Road, 51 Perch bare land with well secured right round parapet wall & security hut for rent or lease for a company. Pipe born water & Electricity available. High Flat solid land never goes under water. Ideal for vehicle yard, Vehicle park , Storage etc etc. Previously occupied by a leading Finance company. Pls call 0718464459.
